DOC.criteria: Premenopausal selfreport Body Mass Index 2539.9 kg/m2 Fasting glucose ≥100 < 126 mg/dL and/or Oral Glucose Tolerance Test ( OGTT ) 2hour glucose ≥140 < 199 mg/dL and/or Quantitative insulin sensitivity check index ( QUICKI ) score < 0.315 and/or Homeostasis Model Assessment ( HOMA ) > 3.67 , log HOMA > 0.085 and/or Glycated Hemoglobin HbA1c ≥5.7 < 6.5fasting glucose ≥100 < 126 mg/dL and/or Fasting triglyceride concentration > 150 mg/dL and/or LDL cholesterol > 100 mg/dL and/or HDL cholesterol < 40 mg/dL . BMI < 25 > 39.9 kg/m2 Presence metabolic disease , selfreport Gastrointestinal disorder selfreport Presence cancer serious chronic disease selfreport Current use prescribe counter weight loss medication Pregnant Lactating Current use tobacco Moderate strenuous physical activity > 30 min/day , 5 day per week Weight change > 5 % body weight previous 6 month Dietary restriction would interfere consume intervention food
